page.title: 06OUR SCHOOL BUILDING
page.content: Our school is called {Clanfield {Petersgate County First School.}It was built 8 years ago. The grounds measure approximately 100 metres X 150 metres. There are places to park 23 cars in the car park. The building is an open-plan design. There are 7 teaching areas, 3 in lower school wing and 4 in top school wing. There is a hall connecting the two wings that is also used as a dining area. There is a kitchen but meals are no longer cooked on the premises but brought from Emsworth. There is a 'wet' area and a 'quiet' area connected to each teaching area. Each teaching area has cloakroom facilities. There is also a music studio, a computer room, a television room, an office for the secretary and another for the headteacher.
